com.tineye.services
Class MulticolorEngineRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.tineye.services.TinEyeServiceRequest
      com.tineye.services.MetadataRequest
          com.tineye.services.MulticolorEngineRequest

public class MulticolorEngineRequest
extends MetadataRequest

Provides methods to call the TinEye Service MulticolorEngine API methods.

Copyright (C) 2011-2012 Idee Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.

Parameters:
apiURL - The MulticolorEngine API URL
username - The username for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to the TinEye Service API
password - The password for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to the TinEye Service API
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If the apiURL is null

Method Detail

searchImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchImage(Image image,
                                          net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                          net.sf.json.JSONArray returnMetadata,
                                          boolean sortMetadata,
                                          boolean ignoreBackground,
                                          boolean ignoreInteriorBackground,
                                          int minScore,
                                          int offset,
                                          int limit)
                                   throws TinEyeServiceException
Do a color search against the hosted image collection using an image and return matches with corresponding scores.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is considered a background region and its associated color is not included in the search.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • count: The number of search results
  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: color_search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of match
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
image - Image to search the hosted image collection using colors from that image
metadata - Metadata to perform additional filtering on the search results
returnMetadata - Metadata fields to return with each match, which can include sorting options
sortMetadata - If true, sort results by metadata score instead of by match score
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
minScore - Minimum score of search results to return
offset - Offset from start of search results to return (starting from 0)
limit - The maximum number of results to return
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the color search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API color_search request or parsing the response

searchFilepath

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchFilepath(java.lang.String filepath,
                                             net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                             net.sf.json.JSONArray returnMetadata,
                                             boolean sortMetadata,
                                             boolean ignoreBackground,
                                             boolean ignoreInteriorBackground,
                                             int minScore,
                                             int offset,
                                             int limit)
                                      throws TinEyeServiceException
Do a color search against the hosted image collection using the filepath of an image in the hosted image collection and return matches with corresponding scores.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is considered a background region and its associated color is not included in the search.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • count: The number of search results
  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: color_search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of match
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepath - The collection filepath to the image whose colors to use for searching
metadata - Metadata to perform additional filtering on the search results
returnMetadata - Metadata fields to return with each match, which can include sorting options
sortMetadata - If true, sort results by metadata score instead of by match score
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
minScore - Minimum score of search results to return
offset - Offset from start of search results to return (starting from 0)
limit - The maximum number of results to return
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the color search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API color_search request or parsing the response

  • count: The number of search results
  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail

ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images

searchColor

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchColor(java.awt.Color[] colors,
                                          float[] weights,
                                          net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                          net.sf.json.JSONArray returnMetadata,
                                          boolean sortMetadata,
                                          int minScore,
                                          int offset,
                                          int limit)
                                   throws TinEyeServiceException
Do a color search against the hosted image collection using specified colors and return matches with corresponding scores.

Each color may have an associated weight, indicating how for much of that color should appear in a search result. If weights are used, there must be a weight for each color.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • count: The number of search results
  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: color_search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of match
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
colors - List of colors for searching thfor e collection
weights - List of weights corresponding to the colors, or empty list
metadata - Metadata to perform additional filtering on the search results
returnMetadata - Metadata fields to return with each match, which can include sorting options
sortMetadata - If true, sort results by metadata score instead of by match score
minScore - Minimum score of search results to return
offset - Offset from start of search results to return (starting from 0)
limit - The maximum number of results to return
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the color search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API color_search request or parsing the response

searchMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchMetadata(net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                             net.sf.json.JSONArray returnMetadata,
                                             boolean sortMetadata,
                                             int minScore,
                                             int offset,
                                             int limit)
                                      throws TinEyeServiceException
Search against the hosted image collection using metadata and return matches with corresponding scores.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • count: The number of search results
  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: color_search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • metadata_score: Relevance score of match based on metadata
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
metadata - Metadata to perform additional filtering on the search results
returnMetadata - Metadata fields to return with each match, which can include sorting options
sortMetadata - If true, sort results by metadata score instead of by match score
minScore - Minimum score of search results to return
offset - Offset from start of search results to return (starting from 0)
limit - The maximum number of results to return
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API color_search request or parsing the response

extractImageColorsImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject extractImageColorsImage(Image[] images,
                                                      int limit,
                                                      boolean ignoreBackground,
                                                      boolean ignoreInteriorBackground,
                                                      java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                               throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors from the images passed in.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the images.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_image_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: The extracted color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the images
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - The images to extract colors from
limit - The maximum number of colors to be extracted
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
colorFormat - To be returned, must be either rgb or hex
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the extracted colors
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API extract_image_colors request or parsing the response

extractImageColorsURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject extractImageColorsURL(java.lang.String[] imageURLs,
                                                    int limit,
                                                    boolean ignoreBackground,
                                                    boolean ignoreInteriorBackground,
                                                    java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                             throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors from images at the given URLs.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the images.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_image_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: The extracted color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the images
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
imageURLs - URLs to images to extract colors from
limit - The maximum number of colors to be extracted
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
colorFormat - To be returned, must be either rgb or hex
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the extracted colors
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API extract_image_colors request or parsing the response

                                                              java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                                       throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors given the filepaths of images in the hosted image collection.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the image.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:

    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the image
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepaths - Filepaths to images in the hosted image collection to extract colors from

extractCollectionColorsMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject extractCollectionColorsMetadata(net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                                              int limit,
                                                              java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                                       throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors in the hosted image collection filtered by image metadata. Metadata can be set to null to extract colors from all images in the collection.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the collection.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: The extracted color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the collection
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
metadata - Metadata to use to filter the results, can be null
limit - The maximum number of colors to be extracted
colorFormat - To be returned, must be either rgb or hex
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the extracted colors
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API extract_collection_colors request or parsing the response

extractCollectionColors

public net.sf.json.JSONObject extractCollectionColors(int limit,
                                                      java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                               throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors in the hosted image collection.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the collection.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: The extracted color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the collection
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
limit - The maximum number of colors to be extracted
colorFormat - To be returned, must be either rgb or hex
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the extracted colors
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API extract_collection_colors request or parsing the response

extractCollectionColorsColors

public net.sf.json.JSONObject extractCollectionColorsColors(java.awt.Color[] colors,
                                                            float[] weights,
                                                            int limit,
                                                            java.lang.String colorFormat)
                                                     throws TinEyeServiceException
Extract the dominant colors in the hosted image collection filtered by colors. The colors passed in are used to get a set of images that have those colors, and then colors are extracted from that set of images and returned.

Color dominance is returned as a weight between 1 and 100 showing how much of the color associated with the weight appears in the collection.

Each passed in color may have an associated weight to indicate how much of a color should be in the set of images to extract colors from. If weights are included then there must be one weight for each passed in color, each weight must be between 1 and 100 and all weights must add to 100.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: extract_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: The extracted color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • rank: Integer value used to group images with similar color palettes together. Results are sorted by rank.
    • weight: Float value between 1 and 100 indicating how much of that color is in the collection
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
colors - Array of colors used to filter the results.
weights - Array of color weights used to filter the results.
limit - The maximum number of colors to be extracted
colorFormat - To be returned, must be either rgb or hex
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the extracted colors
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API extract_collection_colors request or parsing the response

countImageColorsImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countImageColorsImage(Image[] images,
                                                    java.awt.Color[] countColors,
                                                    boolean ignoreBackground,
                                                    boolean ignoreInteriorBackground)
                                             throws TinEyeServiceException
Upload a list of images to the API and a color palette to get a count for each color specifying how many of the input images contain that color.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is considered a background region and its associated color is not counted.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_image_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of input images that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of input images that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - Array of images to count the colors from
countColors - Array of colors to get image counts for
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the passed in images.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_image_colors request or parsing the response

countImageColorsURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countImageColorsURL(java.lang.String[] imageURLs,
                                                  java.awt.Color[] countColors,
                                                  boolean ignoreBackground,
                                                  boolean ignoreInteriorBackground)
                                           throws TinEyeServiceException
Given a list of image URLs and a color palette, get a count for each color specifying how many of the images at the given URLs contain that color.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is consider and its associated color is not counted.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_image_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of input images that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of input images that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
imageURLs - Array of URLs to images to count the colors from
countColors - Array of colors to get image counts for
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the passed in images.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exceptiCollectionon occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_image_colors request or parsing the response

countCollectionColorsFilepath

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countCollectionColorsFilepath(java.lang.String[] filepaths,
                                                            java.awt.Color[] countColors)
                                                     throws TinEyeServiceException
Given a list of filepaths in the hosted image collection, and a color palette (list of colors), get a count for each color specifying the number of the images contain that color.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepaths - Filepaths to images in the hosted image collection to get color counts for.
countColors - Array of colors to get image counts for
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the specified hosted image collection images.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_collection_colors request or parsing the response

countCollectionColorsMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countCollectionColorsMetadata(net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata,
                                                            java.awt.Color[] countColors)
                                                     throws TinEyeServiceException
Given a color palette (list of colors) and metadata, get a count for each color specifying the number of the hosted image collection images that contain that color, filtered by the metadata. Metadata can be set to null to count colors from all images in the collection.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
metadata - Metadata to filter the hosted collection images returned that contain the given colors
countColors - Array of colors to get image counts for
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the hosted image collection image filtered by metadata.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_collection_colors request or parsing the response

countCollectionColors

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countCollectionColors(java.awt.Color[] countColors)
                                             throws TinEyeServiceException
Get counts for each color specified in a color palette (list of colors) from the hosted image collection.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
countColors - The palette of colors to count in the filtered image collection
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the hosted image collection.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_collection_colors request or parsing the response

countCollectionColorsColors

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countCollectionColorsColors(java.awt.Color[] colors,
                                                          float[] weights,
                                                          java.awt.Color[] countColors)
                                                   throws TinEyeServiceException
Filter images in the hosted image collection by color and then get counts for each color specified in a color palette (list of colors) from the filtered image list.

Each passed in filter color may have an associated weight to indicate how much of a color should be in the set of images to count colors from. If weights are included then there must be one weight for each passed in color, each weight must be between 1 and 100 and all weights must add to 100.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_collection_colors
  • result: Array with a JSON objects with the following fields:
    • color: A color in hex format, or an array with that color's 3 RGB values
    • num_images_partial_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in any percentage
    • num_images_full_area: The number of images in the hosted image collection that contain the palette color in a very large percentage
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
colors - Array of colors to filter image collection
weights - Array of color weights to filter image collection
countColors - The palette of colors to count in the filtered image collection
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of the palette colors in the hosted image collection images filtered by color.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_collection_colors request or parsing the response

countMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countMetadata(net.sf.json.JSONObject[] countMetadata)
                                     throws TinEyeServiceException
Given one of more metadata queries, get a counter for each query specifying how many of the collection images match the query.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object which has a metadata field set to a list of JSON objects with the counts for each metadata query passed in, along with the original metadaColorsta passed in.
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
countMetadata - Array of metadata queries to get image counts for.
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of images matching each metadata query passed in.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_metadata request or parsing the response

countMetadataMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countMetadataMetadata(net.sf.json.JSONObject[] countMetadata,
                                                    net.sf.json.JSONObject metadata)
                                             throws TinEyeServiceException
Given one of more metadata queries, get a counter for each query specifying how many of the collection images match the query. The images counted in the results may be filtered using json metadata.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object which has a metadata field set to a list of JSON objects with the counts for each metadata query passed in, along with the original metadaColorsta passed in.
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
countMetadata - Array of metadata queries to get image counts for.
metadata - Metadata to filter the images counted.
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of images matching each metadata query passed in.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_metadata request or parsing the response

countMetadataColors

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countMetadataColors(net.sf.json.JSONObject[] countMetadata,
                                                  java.awt.Color[] colors,
                                                  float[] weights)
                                           throws TinEyeServiceException
Given one of more colors and metadata queries, get a counter specifying how many of the collection images with the given colors match each query.

A weight may be given for each color indicating how much of a color should appear in a matching image. Weights must be given for each color if weights are included, and each weight must be between 1 and 100 and they all must add to 100.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object which has a metadata field set to a list of JSON objects with the counts for each image with matching colors, for each metadata query passed in.
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
countMetadata - Array of metadata queries to get image counts for.
colors - Array of colors in the images to count.
weights - Array of color weights for each color included the images to count (optional).
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of images matching the colors and each metadata query passed in.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_metadata request or parsing the response

countMetadataFilepaths

public net.sf.json.JSONObject countMetadataFilepaths(net.sf.json.JSONObject[] countMetadata,
                                                     java.lang.String[] filepaths)
                                              throws TinEyeServiceException
Given one or more hosted image filepaths and metadata queries, get a counter specifying how many of the images from the specified filepaths match each query.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: count_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object which has a metadata field set to a list of JSON objects with the counts for each image from the given filepaths that match each metadata query passed in.
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
countMetadata - Array of metadata queries to get image counts for.
filepaths - Array of hosted image filepaths to get metadata counts for.
Returns:
The MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the count of images matching each metadata query passed in.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the MulticolorEngine API count_metadata request or parsing the response
